mapper.sql: taskId, proId, squadId, taskName, sDate, eDate, taskState, taskProgress, taskLogRecordId, taskDevelopLogId,handler
mapper.select: select COUNT (taskId) from project_task where handler = #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into project_task (taskId, proId, squadId, taskName, sDate, eDate, taskState, taskProgress, taskLogRecordId, taskDevelopLogId) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{squadid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskprogress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasklogrecordid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskdeveloplogid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

taskId,

mapper.update:
update project_task
proId = #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
squadId = #{squadid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
taskName = #{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sDate = #{sdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eDate = #{edate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskState = #{taskstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskProgress = #{taskprogress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskLogRecordId = #{tasklogrecordid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
taskDevelopLogId = #{taskdeveloplogid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project_task set proId = #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, squadId = #{squadid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taskName = #{taskname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sDate = #{sdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eDate = #{edate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskState = #{taskstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskProgress = #{taskprogress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskLogRecordId = #{tasklogrecordid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taskDevelopLogId = #{taskdeveloplogid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
